scripts.wipe: rm -rf package-lock.json && rm -rf ./node_modules && cd sample && rm -rf package-lock.json && rm -rf ./node_modules
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run build.watch" "cd sample && npm install && export PORT=3339 && npx react-scripts start"
scripts.build.sample: rm -rf ./build && cd sample && npm install && npx react-scripts build && mv ./build ../
scripts.build.lib: cd dist && rm -rf *.* && cd .. && rollup -c && cd dist && ls -al
scripts.clone.component: clear && mkdir -p ./sample/src/components/ && rm -rf ./sample/src/components/* && cp -r src/* sample/src/components/ && echo 'Synchronized'
scripts.tag: npm run build.all && git commit -am 'built next version' && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.ship: rm -rf ./build && npm run build.sample && git commit -am 'built sample project' && git add . && git commit -am 'added build files' && git push
